responses: Hello! Welcome to Hospital InfoBot. How can I assist you today?
We offer services such as general checkups, emergency care, surgery, maternity, pediatrics, and diagnostics.
You can book an appointment by calling +1-800-HOSP-APP or visiting hospital.com/appointments.
We have specialists in Cardiology, Neurology, Orthopedics, Pediatrics, and more. Visit hospital.com/doctors to see the full list.
Visiting hours are from 10 AM to 6 PM every day. Please follow COVID-19 guidelines during visits.
You can contact us at support@hospital.com or call our helpline at +1-800-HOSPITAL.
Goodbye! Wishing you good health. Feel free to ask if you have more questions.
